headline: O'Reilly Automotive (ORLY) Q4 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for O'Reilly Automotive (ORLY) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended December 2024, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: O'Reilly Automotive (ORLY) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
summary: O'Reilly Automotive (ORLY) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 2.57% and 1.62%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: O'Reilly Automotive (ORLY) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates

headline: O'Reilly (NASDAQ:ORLY) Exceeds Q4 Expectations
summary: Auto parts and accessories retailer O’Reilly Automotive (NASDAQ:ORLY) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q4 CY2024, with sales up 6.9% year on year to $4.10 billion. The company expects the full year’s revenue to be around $17.55 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its GAAP profit of $9.50 per share was 2.7% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: O'Reilly Automotive: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of 12 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $9.71 per share. The auto parts retailer posted revenue of $4.1 billion in the period, also beating Street forecasts. Ten analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $4.03 billion.
